articles.content:
Book "Heaven of Present Era"  published
   Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- O Ik Je, vice-chairman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland, has written a three- volumed  book "Heaven of Present Era"  praising the peerless greatness General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   In the volume 1 "Leader of history" under 16 titles the author impressively wrote about the greatness of General Secretary on the basis of impressions of the realities of the DPRK he has got  while visiting its different parts since he settled down.   
   The book says:   Unlike the South Korean society, the north is a truly patriotic holy land guaranteeing bright future of the nation, since independent politics is administered and national independence is firmly maintained in all aspects of its society.  Marshal Kim Jong Il whom the people in the south unanimously look up to as hero leading the era of independence and symbol of national dignity, is the sagacious leader of the nation who guarantees its future.   Supplemented to the book are O Ik Je's letters addressed to General Secretary, and his statements made at press interviews  and articles he contributed to papers.

articles.content:
New Slovak ambassador presents his credentials
   Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- New Slovak Ambassador E.P. To Korea Peter Paulen today presented his credentials to Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.   Present was Ri In Gyu, vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs.   After receiving the credentials, Kim Yong Nam conversed with the ambassador.
